actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Executive Comment Requested from Farm Credit Admin, USDA.
Executive Comment Received From Farm Credit Admin.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to authorize the Farm Credit System to repurchase certain of the System's obligations and to pay certain costs associated with that repurchase.
short_title: Farm Credit Bond Repurchase Act of 1985

summary.text: Farm Credit Bond Repurchase Act of 1985 - Amends the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to authorize the Governor of the Farm Credit Administration to repurchase certain Farm Credit System obligations and pay certain associated costs.

titles.title: Farm Credit Bond Repurchase Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to authorize the Farm Credit System to repurchase certain of the System's obligations and to pay certain costs associated with that repurchase.
